mapper.select: SELECT P.OWNERNUMBER,P.IMAG,P.SIGNUP,P.CONTENTS,S.* FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK S ON P.OWNERNUMBER = S.OWNERNUMBER WHERE P.OWNERNUMBER=#{OWNERNUMBER}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET CNT=CNT+1 WHERE OWNERNUMBER=#{OWNERNUMBER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(OWNERNUMBER, NAME, IMAG, SIGNUP, CONTENTS) VALUES(#{ownernumber}, #{name}, #{imag}, SYSDATE, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM INQUIRE WHERE OWNERNUMBER=#{OWNERNUMBER} ORDER BY NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* from(SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE ownernumber=#{ownernumber} ORDER BY NO DESC) A) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from review where ownernumber = #{ownernumber}
